list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: make the spontaneous sounds and movements of the face and body that are the instinctive expressions of lively amusement and sometimes also of contempt or derision.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she couldn't help laughing at his jokes
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô không thể giúp cười đùa với những câu chuyện cười của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she gave a loud, silly laugh
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô ấy cười to, ngớ ngẩn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: something that causes laughter; a source of fun, amusement, or derision.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she decided to play along with him for a laugh
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô quyết định chơi cùng anh để cười
